item.title: Roblox: Kart Racing Simulator Codes (August 2024)
item.description:
Kart Racing Simulator is an exciting time-killer of the adventure genre, where you can enjoy pleasant gameplay and take a break from the more dynamic and action-packed Roblox games. Here, your main goal will be to improve your vehicle to win races and rise higher on the leaderboard.

By redeeming Kart Racing Simulator codes, you will receive generous rewards from the developers that will help you progress in the game much faster. Moreover, if you are not an active player, this is a great opportunity to earn some currency and resources, so don't miss your chance.

All Kart Racing Simulator Codes

Working Kart Racing Simulator Codes

There are currently no working Kart Racing Simulator codes, so save this page to keep an eye out for updates.

Expired Kart Racing Simulator Codes

  • summer
  • beach
  • kayo
  • release

Redeeming Kart Racing Simulator codes will be equally useful for both beginners and experienced players. Each code offers decent rewards that will definitely come in handy on the way to the top of the leaderboard.

How to Redeem Codes for Kart Racing Simulator

Fortunately, redeeming Kart Racing Simulator codes is not difficult, and a similar redemption system is often found in other Roblox games. However, if you have no experience with redeeming codes, or do not understand how it works in Kart Racing Simulator , here is a detailed guide:

  • Launch Kart Racing Simulator .
  • Pay attention to the right side of the screen. There will be many buttons of different colors and sizes. Among them, interact with the blue one that says Codes.
  • This will open the redemption menu. There will be an input field and a green Redeem button next to it. Now, enter manually, or better yet, copy and paste one of the above-mentioned active codes into the input field.
  • Lastly, click on the green Redeem button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, you will see a notification below the redemption menu with a list of rewards received.

How to Get More Kart Racing Simulator Codes

To find more Roblox codes, you will need to visit the game's official social media pages. Here, along with other content, the developers often share codes, so you may be lucky enough to find them and be one of the first to receive rewards:

  • Official Kart Racing Simulator Roblox group.
  • Official Kart Racing Simulator X account.
  • Official Kart Racing Simulator Discord server.

item.title: Roblox: My Dragon Tycoon X Codes (August 2024)
item.description:
My Dragon Tycoon X is a well-made and addictive business simulator with an unusual concept for this genre, which makes this game stand out from other Roblox experiences. Here, you will create your kingdom with the help of dragons, which is quite difficult, especially from the beginning.

By redeeming My Dragon Tycoon X codes, you will receive generous rewards from the developers that will significantly speed up the development process. Rewards from codes contain useful resources that will definitely come in handy, such as currency, so don't miss this chance.

All My Dragon Tycoon X Codes

Working My Dragon Tycoon X Codes

  • MDTX - Redeem this code to get 300 Gems.
  • Welcome - Redeem this code to get 1,000 Cash and 50 Gems.

Expired My Dragon Tycoon X Codes

  • My Dragon Tycoon
  • Thanks 10M Visits
  • MDT
  • Sorry Delay XD
  • Amzeee
  • Dosmas Studios

Whether you are a beginner or an experienced player, redeeming My Dragon Tycoon X codes will be equally beneficial. Most of the codes offer Cash and Gems, regular and premium currencies, which will definitely not be superfluous when building a kingdom.

How to Redeem Codes in My Dragon Tycoon X

My Dragon Tycoon X 's redemption system is quite common and often found in other Roblox games. However, if you don't know how it works, or if you haven't had any experience with redeeming codes at all, here's a detailed guide:

  • Launch My Dragon Tycoon X .
  • Pay attention to the left side of the screen. There will be several buttons placed in two rows. Among them, interact with the first one in the second row, with the shopping cart icon.
  • This will open the in-game store. Here, scroll to the very bottom.
  • At the very bottom of the menu, you will find the redemption section, which contains an input field and a green Redeem button next to it. Now, enter manually, or better yet, copy and paste one of the above-mentioned active codes into the input field.
  • Lastly, click on the green Redeem button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, you will be notified that the code was redeemed successfully and the rewards will be credited to your account.

How to Get More My Dragon Tycoon X Codes

In addition to this page, you can also find more Roblox codes on the game's official social media pages. Visit them, check out the latest posts and news, and you might be lucky enough to find new codes that the developers have published:

  • Official My Dragon Tycoon X Roblox group.
  • Official My Dragon Tycoon X YouTube channel.
  • Official My Dragon Tycoon X X account.
  • Official My Dragon Tycoon X Discord server.

item.title: Roblox: Sword Crafters Codes (August 2024)
item.description:
Sword Crafters is a typical representative of Tycoon games on Roblox . Therefore, to progress, you need to create swords and sell them for Cash. However, to craft valuable weapons, players need to upgrade their factories, which will require a large amount of investment. Therefore, in this guide, we will tell you about Sword Crafters codes that will help you become the best on the server.

So, each such code can bring players various rewards, including Cash, which is necessary for upgrades in this Roblox experience. In addition, their validity is limited, so you should not postpone their use.

All Sword Crafters Codes

Working Sword Crafters Codes

There are no active codes in Sword Crafters . We will update this article as soon as more codes become available.

Expired Sword Crafters Codes

There are no expired codes in Sword Crafters .

As befits the Tycoon genre, in Sword Crafters , you just have to wait until your production brings you profit. When you collect enough Cash, you can buy upgrades or new islands and then save money again. However, to spend time usefully, players can visit several worlds to fight mobs using the weapons they have made. In addition, the game has a PvP arena. However, you will quickly be beaten if your weapon is weak. Therefore, you should use Sword Crafters codes.

These codes are great for beginners, as they will reward them with a large amount of Cash. As a result, you will be able to progress much faster. But it is worth noting that each Sword Crafters code is active for a limited time. So, they should be used as soon as possible.

How to Redeem Sword Crafters Codes

Luckily, the code redeeming feature in Sword Crafters works just as easily as in most other Roblox titles. All you need to do is follow these simple steps:

  • Launch Sword Crafters .
  • Next, open the Shop by clicking on the shopping cart icon on the left side of the screen.
  • After that, open the Codes tab.
  • Finally, enter the code and click Redeem to get your free goodies.

How to Get More Sword Crafters Codes

If you want more rewards in Sword Crafters , then you should bookmark this article. We are going to update it as soon as new Roblox codes are released. In addition, we recommend players to visit the developers' official pages to get first-hand news:

  • useless sims Roblox Group

item.title: Roblox: Shoot Toilet Simulator Codes (August 2024)
item.description:
Shoot Toilet Simulator is a fun shooter inspired by the popular Skibidi Toilet trend, which became the concept for many Roblox games. The main goal of the game is to improve your shooting skills and then resist numerous waves of enemies, which is quite difficult and time-consuming.

By redeeming Shoot Toilet Simulator codes, you will receive generous rewards from the developers that will help you progress in the game much faster. Among the rewards will be both precious currency and various kinds of booster potions that will increase your efficiency, so don't miss the opportunity.

All Shoot Toilet Simulator Codes

Working Shoot Toilet Simulator Codes

  • points - Redeem this code to get HP Potion.
  • level - Redeem this code to get Win Potion.
  • 1kupvotes - Redeem this code to get Win Potion.
  • halfthousand - Redeem this code to get three Win Potions.
  • thankyou - Redeem this code to get two Ammo Potions.
  • Pet - Redeem this code to get Dog Pet.
  • Welcome - Redeem this code to get 100 Ammo.

Redeeming Shoot Toilet Simulator codes will be equally useful for both beginners and experienced players. Rewards from codes, especially potion boosters, will greatly help your development in the game, especially if you are not an active player, so be sure to take advantage of the opportunity.

Expired Shoot Toilet Simulator Codes

Currently, there are no expired Shoot Toilet Simulator codes, so redeem the active ones as soon as possible to avoid missing out on rewards.

How to Redeem Codes for Shoot Toilet Simulator

Fortunately, redeeming Shoot Toilet Simulator codes is not difficult, as a similar redemption system is often used in other Roblox games. If you have not redeemed codes before, or do not understand how it works in Shoot Toilet Simulator, here are detailed instructions:

  • Launch Shoot Toilet Simulator .
  • Pay attention to the left side of the screen. There will be several buttons arranged in three rows. Among them, interact with the first one in the first row, with the shopping cart icon.
  • After opening the new menu, scroll to the very bottom. Here, you will find the redemption section, which will contain an input field and a green Redeem button next to it.
  • Here, interact with the input field and enter, or better yet, copy and paste one of the aforementioned active codes.
  • Lastly, click on the green Redeem button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, you will see a notification below the redemption menu with a list of rewards received.

How to Get More Shoot Toilet Simulator Codes

Just like the developers of other Roblox games, the creators of Shoot Toilet Simulator often share new codes on the game's official social media. So, by being attentive and visiting these pages regularly, you can be one of the first to find the codes and get rewards:

  • Official Shoot Toilet Simulator Roblox group.
  • Official Shoot Toilet Simulator X account.
  • Official Shoot Toilet Simulator YouTube channel.
  • Official Shoot Toilet Simulator Discord server.

item.title: Once Human: Unfinished Expedition Quest Guide
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Starting the Quest
  • Finding the First Document: the Environmental Security Records
  • Finding the Second Document: Army Records
  • Finding the Third Document: Medical Record
  • Completing the Quest

Quests are a straightforward way to progress through the game while earning experience in Once Human . However, Unfinished Expedition Quest adds a twist. Full of challenging puzzles and objectives, this quest will surely test your skills. Fortunately, this guide will provide a complete walkthrough for this quest that will help you to encounter every challenge that the Unfinished Expedition Quest throws at you.

Starting the Quest

You can begin the quest by heading over to the Lighthouse , which is located near Meyer’s Market in the Broken Delta Region . The approximate coordinates for the location are 6539, -6976 .

After reaching the destination, climb to the top floor and look at the expedition notes . This will begin the quest, and mark three spots on your map. The purpose of these spots is to help you find Rosetta’s Research Documents .

Finding the First Document: the Environmental Security Records

To locate the first document, you must reach the Lighthouse on a ship , just off the coast. You can use two methods to reach your destination:

  1. Climb the nearby striped tower and glide down towards the ship.
  2. Jump from the peak of the Lighthouse and glide directly towards the ship.

You’ll find the first document placed at the front end of the ship .

Finding the Second Document: Army Records

You’ll locate the second document at the Rosetta Army Base . However, you must solve an optical puzzle (located at the side of a building within the Base) to access this document. Match the picture on the building with its other half (located on the shipping container). Once the picture aligns perfectly, a path will appear . Go inside to claim your second document.

Finding the Third Document: Medical Record

You’ll acquire the third document on the first floor of Rosetta Laboratory . Here, you’ll find a computer that brings up yet another puzzle . Solve it by rotating the pieces until they align perfectly with each other.

The final document will present itself after successful completion of the puzzle.

Completing the Quest

The next step involves heading to Meyer’s Market and looking for Claire or Maxie and handing them the documents.

It doesn’t matter who you give it to from the above-mentioned characters, either one will complete the quest and reward you with the same items.

This marks the end of the quest for your character, after which you can expect to receive numerous rewards. Rewards for completing this quest include:

  • 600 Experience Points
  • 240 Energy Links
  • 106 Battle Pass Exp
  • 7x Stellar Planula
  • Eclipse Cortex Lv. 2
